page.title: 13Berwick St.James 1st School
page.content:
{ { The school}takes children aged from five to nine, from the villages of Winterbourne Stoke, Berwick St. James and Stapleford. At the age of nine the children move to Wilton Middle School. At present there are 26 children in the school which is an indication of how few young families there are in the villages. The children are divided into two class groups. There has always been the worry for parents that the school might have to close because of low numbers. As an indication of population trends the age spread of the present pupils is:
Juniors (7-9) : 4 children
Infants (5-7) : 22 children
